tool_description: Analyzes the frequency distribution of customer issues to identify the most common complaints and problems.

issue_categories.description: Array of categorized customer issues to analyze

top_n.description: Number of top issues to return in ranking

minimum_frequency.description: Minimum occurrence count for an issue to be included

error_messages: Empty issue array: Provide at least one issue category for analysis.
Invalid top_n value: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 100.
Invalid minimum_frequency: Must be a positive integer.
No qualifying issues: No issues meet the minimum frequency threshold.
usage: Provide categorized issues and configure ranking parameters. The tool returns frequency counts and rankings of customer problems.

issue_frequencies.description: Frequency counts for each unique issue category

issue_names.description: Names of unique issue categories corresponding to frequencies

top_issues.description: Most frequently occurring issues in ranked order

total_issues.description: Total number of issue instances analyzed
